description: A flexible pipeline for CUT&RUN processing and footprint analysis | We introduce CUT&RUNAgents as a flexible, general pipeline for facilitating the identification of chromatin-associated protein binding and genomic footprinting analysis from antibody-targeted CUT&RUN primary cleavage data. CUT&RUNAgents extracts endonuclease cut site information from sequences of short-read fragments and produces single-locus binding estimates, aggregate motif footprints, and informative visualizations to support the high-resolution mapping capability of CUT&RUN. CUT&RUNAgents is available at https: bitbucket.org qzhudfci cutrunagents
name: CUT and RUNAgents
